data.text:
Fire Truck

While touring the Toledo Fire Department garage, Mr. Kisauji of Tanga, voiced the need for a fire truck. Toledo’s then current Mayor Michael Bell (who was Fire Chief at the time) arranged for the donation of a used fire truck, and the Tanga Sister City committee raised funds to ship it to Tanga.

The fire truck proved instrumental in not only for putting out fires but to act as a water supplier in areas where residents could not find water.

One of the many community fund raising events in Toledo, Ohio to ship the fire truck to Tanga, Tanzania.
